name: allenai/objaverse
description: Objaverse, a dataset of over 800,000 annotated 3D objects, offers a unique and extensive resource for the AI community. With its diverse range of objects, licensed under the ODC-By v1.0, this dataset provides an opportunity for researchers, developers, and enthusiasts to advance the field of 3D object understanding. Whether you're working on computer vision, robotics, or AI, Objaverse offers a wealth of data to help drive innovation and discovery.
citeAs: @article{objaverse,   title={Objaverse: A Universe of Annotated 3D Objects},   author={Matt Deitke and Dustin Schwenk and Jordi Salvador and Luca Weihs and           Oscar Michel and Eli VanderBilt and Ludwig Schmidt and           Kiana Ehsani and Aniruddha Kembhavi and Ali Farhadi},   journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2212.08051},   year={2022} }
creator: allenai
